name: JellyZap
description:
This is the 7th game I made for 1GAM (http://www.onegameamonth.com/yeahmenphil) !

You play as a silly jellyfish and you have to zap the mean fishes while avoiding the bombs. It's really cool, you'll see !

Twitter: https://twitter.com/_smallphil

Please give me your feedback :D I'd appreciate it a lot !

Music: "Hep Cats" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
